statements: SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyIntegration
SELECT api_name, service_name FROM ThirdPartyIntegration
SELECT documentation_url FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE integration_type='OAuth'
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyIntegration ORDER BY service_name ASC
SELECT api_name, service_name FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE id=1
SELECT id, api_name, integration_type, service_name, documentation_url FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE integration_type = 'REST';
SELECT id, api_name FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE service_name LIKE 'Payment%';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE documentation_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT api_name, service_name FROM ThirdPartyIntegration WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM third_party_tools;
SELECT tool_name, api_key FROM third_party_tools WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM integration_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT platform_name, api_endpoint FROM integration_platforms WHERE id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT tool_name FROM third_party_tools;
SELECT * FROM third_party_tools WHERE tool_name = 'Analytics Tool';
SELECT tool_name, api_key FROM third_party_tools WHERE id = 3;
SELECT platform_name, api_endpoint FROM integration_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT id, tool_name, api_key FROM third_party_tools WHERE id <= 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_tools WHERE api_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Integrations;
SELECT integration_name, api_key FROM Integrations ORDER BY integration_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyTools WHERE tool_name = 'Example Tool';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM ThirdPartyTools WHERE tool_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT functionality_id, functionality_name FROM PlatformFunctionality ORDER BY functionality_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Integrations
SELECT integration_name, api_key FROM Integrations
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM ThirdPartyTools
SELECT functionality_name FROM PlatformFunctionality
SELECT * FROM Integrations WHERE integration_id = '123'
SELECT * FROM third_party_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_api_url FROM third_party_tools;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_id = '123';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description, tool_api_url FROM third_party_tools WHERE tool_id = '456';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description, tool_api_url FROM third_party_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_tools;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_api_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description, tool_api_url FROM third_party_tools WHERE tool_api_url LIKE '%api%';
SELECT service_id, service_description FROM services ORDER BY service_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM platform_integration WHERE integration_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis;
SELECT api_name, api_key FROM third_party_apis WHERE integration_status = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, api_name, log_timestamp FROM integration_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM platform_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT provider_name, api_endpoint, integration_date FROM service_providers WHERE integration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE integration_status = TRUE;
SELECT api_name, api_key FROM third_party_apis ORDER BY api_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM platform_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM platform_users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM integration_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
